item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: My first post for the personal blog
item.content:encoded:
Hi, there. I do investment-focused data sciencie / programming / research projects for living. I love finding the ideas, spaces and cultures that may forever reshape the world.

In this blog, Iâ€™m about to share my journey into:
